features: Say Goodbye to Foggy Mirrors: This Fogless Shower Mirror features an anti-fog coating that keeps it clear and fog-free, even in hot showers. No more hassle of scraping or treating the mirror with sprays.

Adjustable Lighting with 3 Color Modes: Equipped with 56 dimmable LED light beads, this fogless mirror for shower with light offers three lighting modes for enhanced visibility. Easily change colors and adjust brightness for shaving or makeup needs.

Bigger Size for Better Visibility: Experience a larger reflective surface than regular shaving mirrors with our 6.7*8.4 inch anti-fog shaving mirror, which provides a clear view of your face and neck. It also comes with a convenient razor holder, keeping your accessories within reach.

Easy Installation and Safety: The fogless shower shaving mirror comes with 2 long-lasting adhesive hooks that stick securely to any smooth surface. No tools required! Made of high-quality impact resistant and shatterproof PC mirror for bathroom safety.
Shaving In The Shower: Fogless shower mirror angle adjustable, tilt up and down or rotate 360° to give you a proper angle, perfect for small spaces and showers. Great gift for your husband.

Upgraded Fogless Shower Mirror: We've made thoughtful design improvements for your comfort. The light button is strategically placed to avoid interference while shaving. Customer satisfaction is our top priority,Widitn shower mirror fogless is backed by 12-month warranty. Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or concerns.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 3 Color Mode 2 Adjustable Lighting

Widitn Fogless Shower Mirror Anti-fog Effect Test No More Frustrating Fogged-Up Mirrors！ Compared to ordinary mirrors, the Widitn Fogless Shower Mirror provides a fog-free effect in hot water shower bathroom, with excellent anti-fogging and crystal-clear Reflection! 3 Color-Lighting Options & Adjustable Lighting Bright and Adjustable Lighting For You. Featuring three different lighting options and brightness settings, it provides great illumination for shaving and is perfect for shaving or applying makeup in the shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works as described. Looked the anti fog feature. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shower mirror
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great size fog less shower mirror, puts out three light option, all are pretty bright. Seems like good quality. It comes with two attachment pieces which is handy because I didn’t out it on correctly the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Here is great like the lights, but it fogged up!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did everything it says!
reviews.reviewText: Unless I actually splash water on this mirror, it stays frost free. I don't really need the lighting for shaving since I have lighting directly overhead. Lighting works well and has the different features as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was unimpressed as soon as I opened the box. Feels light and poorly constructed. Doesn't come with batteries either. Attaches via an adhesive pad that feels like it will fail within 30 days, as soon as soapy water begins seeping between it and the wall. Im returning it after the first use, so I can't say for sure but I don't have faith it will hold and won't wait for it to fall on break on me. Immediately fogged up the very first use. No squeegee included so I tried wiping away the fog with my hand, which just made the light cycle between modes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Ummm not fog free, but nice light
reviews.reviewText: This fogs up very easily. If you splash some water on it, it will go clear for a little while then fog up again. A plus however is when you throw water on it the light turns on and off?!?!!Also sticks out from the wall pretty far so I hope you have a big shower or ninja skills to dodge it while living around. Am looking to buy a different one now just after 2 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars All good but the anti-fog
reviews.reviewText: Mounts easy, lights work ok, but it fogs very easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars See Clearly In the Steam
reviews.reviewText: My husband required a mirror in his shower because there was nowhere else in this small house to shave. This fogless shower mirror has an anti-fog coating that prevents fogging even when vapor from the shower is recurrent.The LED lighting on the mirror is dimmable and can be displayed in three distinct color modes. The brightness can be adjusted according to your requirements and preferences, and the mirror measures approximately six by eight inches. It also has a holder on the bottom to retain the razors securely.It is easy to install in the shower because the adhesive hooks adhere to most smooth surfaces. The mirror is resistant to shattering and impacts. It is reasonably priced, the ideal measure for the shower, and meets my husband's needs admirably.
